wikipedia_page.main: Richard Carter was a land agent and surveyor in Halifax, West Yorkshire, England. In 1846 he had both Thomas Archer Hirst and John Tyndall working for him. He introduced them, thereby cementing some of the first bonds in the famous X Club to which T H Huxley and others also belonged.

response: * Richard Carter (MP for Cornwall) (1617–1668), MP for Cornwall
* Richard Carter (land agent) (), English land agent and surveyor
* Richard Carter (American football) (1919–2002), American football and basketball coach
* Samuel Christian, founder of the Philadelphia Black Mafia who also went by the name Richard Carter
